ComicInfo.Summary: It's movie night. The people of Marshville gather together at the local theater for some popcorn and reruns. Meriem, not having seen a film since she was a little girl, is thrilled at the prospect of seeing a movie again! She quickly returns to town with Klyde in tow; however, they discover that the theater doors are too small for Klyde to fit through. Now they must come up with a way to see to it that Klyde gets to see the film before he gets upset and ruins the night out for everyone!
